timeline.message:
Fix eventstream legacy generation

Legacy generation uses the shape name as the event name. Transcribe Streaming
has a member event named "TranscriptEvent", but its shape is
"MedicalTranscriptEvent". This only affected interfaces, marshalling/marshalling
is okay.

timeline.bodyText: Note: legacy uses event shape name, so this caused a clash because we generated two "visitEventOne" methods; one is because the non legacy event was called "eventOne", and the legacy customized one had a shape name of "EventOne"
timeline.author: dagnir
